# Introduccion a Altair

## Importar el dataset

```{python}
import altair as alt
from vega_datasets import data
cars = data.cars()
print(cars.head())
```


## Visualización en Altair

### Visualización scatterplot

```{python}

alt.Chart(cars).mark_point().encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon",
    y="Horsepower",
    tooltip=["Name","Origin","Miles_per_Gallon","Horsepower"]
).interactive()
#interactive: zoom, brush

```

### Visualización scatterplot con color

```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point(filled=True).encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon",
    y="Horsepower",
    color="Origin",
    tooltip=["Name","Origin","Miles_per_Gallon","Horsepower"]
).interactive()

```

```{python}


alt.Chart(cars).mark_point(filled=True).encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon",
    y="Horsepower",
    shape="Origin",
    color = "Origin",
    tooltip=["Name","Origin","Miles_per_Gallon","Horsepower"]
).interactive()
```


### Agregacion

Grafico de barras
```{python}

alt.Chart(cars).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('Origin',sort='y'),
    alt.Y('count()')
)

```

`Mean()`de cada uno de los origenes

```{python}

alt.Chart(cars).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('Origin',sort='y'),
    alt.Y('mean(Weight_in_lbs)'),
    tooltip=['Origin','mean(Weight_in_lbs)']
).properties(
    width= 200,
    height = 200
)

```

Grafico lineal


```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_line(point=True).encode(
    alt.X('Year'),
    alt.Y('mean(Weight_in_lbs)'),
    alt.Color('Origin')
).properties(
    width = 600
).interactive()

```
